title: Bueckers goes No. 1 to Wings fresh off UConn title
description: Paige Bueckers, coming off leading UConn to its first national championship in nine years, was selected No. 1 by the Dallas Wings in the 2025 WNBA draft on Monday night.
author: Alexa Philippou

title: PSG's Doue, the teenager who is the talk of Europe
description: PSG teenager Desire Doue has gone from a false start to the talk of European football, says BBC Sport's chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: Newcastle boss Howe recovering from pneumonia
description: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe thanks fans for their "messages and warm wishes" after the club announced he is recovering in hospital having being diagnosed with pneumonia.

title: How Rory topped Tiger's 2019 Masters win on 'one of greatest days in golf'
description: Sir Nick Faldo said Rory McIlroy's Masters triumph tops Tiger Woods' Augusta National victory back in 2019 as Butch Harmon hailed the Northern Irishman for completing the career Grand Slam on "one of the greatest days in golf we will ever see".

title: McIlroy makes Grand Slam history with dramatic Masters play-off win
description: Rory McIlroy ended his long wait for a fifth major title and completed the career Grand Slam with a dramatic play-off victory over Justin Rose at The Masters.

title: Pros and cons of the Dallas Wings picking Ole Miss' Madison Scott in 2025 WNBA Draft
description: Who drafted Madison Scott? The Dallas Wings picked the Ole Miss star in the second round of the 2025 WNBA Draft. Here's what to expect:

title: Angel Reese had a perfect reaction to reuniting with new Sky teammate Hailey Van Lith
description: Angel Reese and Hailey Van Lith are teammates once more!
